name: arma-server-manager
description: Arma 3 server manager with mod management, server configuration, and scheduling capabilities

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env FLASK_ENV=production uv run python main.py
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && uv sync && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.start:prod: FLASK_ENV=production cd backend && uv run python main.py
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format: pnpm run format:backend && pnpm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format .
